sense.gloss: skillful, skilful, skilled, good, expert, clever (expression, trick, etc.), apt, appropriate
good (deal, idea, etc.), profitable, promising, lucky, fortunate, successful, satisfactory, splendid

sdata.j: このスープ、|↑旨↑↓うま↓い|ね。
sdata.e: This soup is really delicious, isn't it?

sdata.j: イタリアンパスタは|↑旨↑↓うま↓い|よ。
